query: 如图,BD为△ABC的内角平分线,CE为△ABC的外角平分线,AD⊥BD于D,AE⊥CE于E,延长AD交BC的延长线于F,连接DE,设BC=2,AC=3,AB=4,则DE的长为()选项：['\\frac{1}{2}', '\\frac{1}{3}', '\\frac{2}{3}', '\\frac{3}{4}']
answer: 【解答】解:延长AE交BF的延长线于G,在△ABD和△FBD中,≥ft\{\begin{array}{l}{∠{ABD}=∠{FBD}}\\{{BD}={BD}}\\{∠{ADB}=∠{FDB}=90°}\end{array}\right.,∴△ABD≌△FBD(ASA),∴BF=BA=4,AD=DF,∴CF=BF-BC=2,同理△ACE≌△GCE,∴CG=CA=3,AE=EG,∴FG=1,∵AD=DF,AE=EG,∴DE=\frac{1}{2}FG=\frac{1}{2},
